data.name: Quake Champions - Champions Pack
data.detailed_description: This pack, available for a limited time, includes the full roster of current and future Champions, three Reliquaries, an exclusive Ranger skin, and the ability to play in custom games.
data.about_the_game: This pack, available for a limited time, includes the full roster of current and future Champions, three Reliquaries, an exclusive Ranger skin, and the ability to play in custom games.
data.short_description: This pack, available for a limited time, includes the full roster of current and future Champions, three Reliquaries, an exclusive Ranger skin, and the ability to play in custom games.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 and later
  • Процессор: AMD Phenom II X4-945 / Intel Core 2 Quad 6600
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD R7 240 GB / Nvidia GT 730 2GB / Intel HD 530
  • Место на диске: 20 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 and later
  • Процессор: AMD FX-8320 / Intel i5-2400
  • Оперативная память: 16 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD R9 290 4GB / Nvidia GTX 770 4GB
  • Место на диске: 20 GB
